title: Was Season of elements a hard reset?
body:
i peaked at plat 3 last season and ended gold 2.

this season i placed in this order, 3rd, 1st, 6th, 7th, 1st and placed bronze 4

is it just me or did it hard reset?

replies.body: I think they said we'd get a hard reset.
Yeah, I ended Plat IV and started Iron II.  After winning just 3 games, though, I'm Bronze III, so you should be able to climb back up quickly enough.

> [{quoted}](name=Porglit,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=6kLYE8mZ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-11-21T21:54:27.437+0000)
>
> Yeah, I ended Plat IV and started Iron II.  After winning just 3 games, though, I'm Bronze III, so you should be able to climb back up quickly enough.

I can't be arsed.. I got to Plat 2.. dont really want to play x amount of games to get where I finished last season so I've deleted the game and become a professional troll.. thanks for the Penguin emote though **thumbs up**

Wait what?

What are you guys talking about.
Did the season start already? I thought preseason didn't have rankings?
